input-field.name: itemPerPage
input-field.label: Limitation of items to display per page. If field is not filled, the default value is 5

input-field.name: maxWhishList
input-field.label: Maximum of wishlist per user. If field is not filled, the default value is 4

input-field.name: isRemove
input-field.label: Remove products from wishlist after adding to cart by default

input-field.name: isShowPopular
input-field.label: Automatically show on every CMS Page

input-field.name: popularProduct
input-field.label: Quantity added product in wishlists to display in slider
